LABEL: 0x3E4
STRING: She let out a flat voice.

LABEL: 0x400
STRING: She didn't seem to understand what was going on.

LABEL: 0x43C
STRING: The tentacles of light were closing in on her.

LABEL: 0x458
STRING: Tokiwa was following them with her eyes.

LABEL: 0x476
STRING: I pulled her by the hand to get her away from them.

LABEL: 0x4CC
STRING: She fell over toward me instantly.

LABEL: 0x4F8
STRING: Paying no heed to what would happen, I pulled her forcefully.

LABEL: 0x52C
STRING: I pulled her close and placed her in my arms like a parent bird protecting their newborn.

LABEL: 0x578
STRING: I could feel her clothes and soft body against me.

LABEL: 0x5C2
STRING: Tokiwa closed her eyes and leaned all her weight against me while breathing heavily.

LABEL: 0x62A
STRING: She might be shaken because she couldn't grasp the situation, but there didn't seem to be anything abnormal besides that.

LABEL: 0x67C
STRING: We escaped from that unknown light...

LABEL: 0x71D
STRING: I let out a sigh of relief,

LABEL: 0x87B
STRING: she just stood there, not moving an inch.

LABEL: 0x8EF
STRING: my eyes were caught by her――

LABEL: 0x9A8
STRING: There, at the feet of the girl standing there...

LABEL: 0xA04
STRING: was reaching out its bizarrely-colored tentacles towards her.

LABEL: 0xA3E
STRING: The light extending across the floor began enveloping Reiri from the tip of her toes.

LABEL: 0xB5D
STRING: The moment that light touched her feet, Reiri's body twitched.

LABEL: 0xBA3
STRING: The light slowly crept up along her body.

LABEL: 0xC0F
STRING: A feeling of pure revulsion beyond fear and curiosity took over my mind.

LABEL: 0xC77
STRING: I strained my eyes, and just then...

LABEL: 0xD6B
STRING: For a moment, we stared at each other.

LABEL: 0xD8B
STRING: Her twisted eyes were looking down at the whole world.

LABEL: 0xDC3
STRING: In reality, it probably didn't even take a few seconds.

LABEL: 0xDEF
STRING: But it felt a whole lot longer than that.

LABEL: 0xE9E
STRING: 「Let me give you a piece of advice.」

LABEL: 0xFCE
STRING: Hurry up and get over here.

LABEL: 0xFF0
STRING: For some reason, Reiri simply stood there with a peaceful look on her face.

LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: I extended my arm towards her and――

LABEL: 0x123C
STRING: I was pushed and almost fell down on the spot with Tokiwa in my arms.

LABEL: 0x12C2
STRING: I immediately looked over to where I had been standing.

LABEL: 0x13AD
STRING: The light was closing in on us.

LABEL: 0x13D7
STRING: Yukari glared at us while avoiding the stretching light.

LABEL: 0x15AD
STRING: Yukari spoke in a serious tone.

LABEL: 0x15E5
STRING: She repeated herself as I was stunned by her sudden words.

LABEL: 0x162E
STRING: 「If you touch that light you'll die too.」

LABEL: 0x1764
STRING: I locked those words into a corner of my mind,

LABEL: 0x17DA
STRING: I made sure to hold Tokiwa tight in my arms.

LABEL: 0x1A00
STRING: Eventually, we slipped out of the bridge and reached the lobby in the front section.

LABEL: 0x1B49
STRING: I couldn't see the light anymore.

LABEL: 0x1B6B
STRING: In the dark, toward the darkness, we just kept running.

LABEL: 0x1B9F
STRING: I could still see an afterimage of the light if I closed my eyes in this darkness.

LABEL: 0x1C85
STRING: Several illusions swirled around me, using the dark hallway as a canvas.

LABEL: 0x1CCB
STRING: I couldn't even decide what to believe anymore.

LABEL: 0x2075
STRING: What the hell was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x20A7
STRING: What did she mean, "There was no other way?"

LABEL: 0x2103
STRING: I looked behind me with a sense of discomfort and doubt.

LABEL: 0x2145
STRING: In an instant, all my doubts vanished.

LABEL: 0x2245
STRING: From its feet to its lower body to its chest, I could see light in the shape of a small girl.

LABEL: 0x2295
STRING: The thing was emitting an ominous glow.

LABEL: 0x22BB
STRING: I could only see it as a mass of light, but at the center of it all was...

LABEL: 0x2387
STRING: There was no room for doubt.

LABEL: 0x23AB
STRING: I couldn't see her clearly, but it was impossible to argue that it wasn't her.

LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: A girl with a confident, sarcastic, and mean-spirited smile.

LABEL: 0x24A0
STRING: Lifeless and light as a doll, that was her.

LABEL: 0x24DA
STRING: A fragile girl who got out of breath just from going down the stairs.

LABEL: 0x275E
STRING: As I tried to run over to her, Yukari held me back by my arm.

LABEL: 0x2895
STRING: Still, I tried to shake her off forcefully but she wouldn't budge an inch.

LABEL: 0x29EF
STRING: Contrary to her brute strength, there was none of it in her words.

LABEL: 0x2ABB
STRING: Tokiwa was staring at the light.

LABEL: 0x2AEB
STRING: She was looking at Reiri, who wasn't even visible anymore.

LABEL: 0x2B21
STRING: Her mind was stuck at the other side of the bridge――

LABEL: 0x2B51
STRING: At the distant light, and the girl that was there.

LABEL: 0x2C52
STRING: Beyond her gaze, the light was solidifying and wavering on the surface of the water.

LABEL: 0x2C92
STRING: At this point, there was no longer any sign of the fallen man or Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2CD2
STRING: You couldn't discern their human shape.

LABEL: 0x2CF8
STRING: There was only light, swaying on the water's surface.

LABEL: 0x2D28
STRING: Green, red, blue, purple... It was a mixture of colors I'd never seen before.

LABEL: 0x2EF6
STRING: 「Reiri... What are we going to do about her?!」

LABEL: 0x2F62
STRING: Yukari had never forgotten her position as the chief attendant.

LABEL: 0x2F9C
STRING: She had never taken the matter of her passengers' lives lightly.

LABEL: 0x2FE2
STRING: She had even suggested retrieving Hikari earlier, who had already lost her life.

LABEL: 0x302C
STRING: And now, she was going to leave Reiri behind on the bridge and retreat to the upper floors.

LABEL: 0x309C
STRING: She was saying it was impossible to save her.

LABEL: 0x30C6
STRING: It must have been a sign of her decision.

LABEL: 0x3179
STRING: 「If we stay here, we'll just get caught by it.」

LABEL: 0x31BA
STRING: If this was back when we first met,

LABEL: 0x31E6
STRING: I wondered what kind of insults I would have showered Yukari with.

LABEL: 0x32A4
STRING: How she must have felt while abandoning her friends,

LABEL: 0x32EE
STRING: and doing her best to guarantee our survival, I had no way of knowing.

LABEL: 0x3392
STRING: At the end of the stairs, I looked up at her small back.

LABEL: 0x33DC
STRING: I thought of how she was forced to act calmly in this situation.

LABEL: 0x3486
STRING: 「I'm sure we'll come back for you.」

LABEL: 0x34B0
STRING: With that, I forced the flickering light behind me out of my head.

LABEL: 0x34F6
STRING: I put my foot on the stairs.

LABEL: 0x35F1
STRING: Our footsteps echoed on the steps.

LABEL: 0x3639
STRING: I pushed myself to move upward.

LABEL: 0x365F
STRING: My shoes, which were filled with seawater, felt awfully heavy.

LABEL: 0x368B
STRING: As time passed, it all began to feel more real.

LABEL: 0x36BF
STRING: Everything had been over so quick.

LABEL: 0x377C
STRING: My feet stopped as I was climbing the stairs.

LABEL: 0x37A6
STRING: When I looked up, Tokiwa had stopped in her tracks.

LABEL: 0x38E8
STRING: I had nothing I could say to her, either.

LABEL: 0x39EA
STRING: Tokiwa let out those small words.

LABEL: 0x3A0E
STRING: Tears were falling from her eyes.

LABEL: 0x3A74
STRING: I understood it from her tears.

LABEL: 0x3AF3
STRING: We wouldn't be seeing her again.

LABEL: 0x3C5A
STRING: She wasn't at the bottom of the sea, nor would she ever return to the surface.

LABEL: 0x3C9C
STRING: The girl who had clung so earnestly to life,

LABEL: 0x3CBE
STRING: with anguished breaths, no matter what it cost,

LABEL: 0x3D22
STRING: Reiri was no longer in this world.

LABEL: 0x3D44
STRING: She had passed away in the dark,

LABEL: 0x3D6C
STRING: unbeknownst to anyone and with no one there to mourn her.

LABEL: 0x3E41
STRING: How did it come to this?

LABEL: 0x3E71
STRING: Weren't we supposed to get rescued?

LABEL: 0x3E9F
STRING: Weren't we going to be saved?

LABEL: 0x3ED1
STRING: How many times had I asked?

LABEL: 0x3EF1
STRING: How many times had I despaired?

LABEL: 0x3F0D
STRING: I repeated pointless questions over and over again in my head.

LABEL: 0x3F41
STRING: And each time I did, I was confused.

LABEL: 0x3FE1
STRING: This wasn't what he had planned, right?

LABEL: 0x40B0
STRING: My unwanted paranoia paralyzed my thoughts――

LABEL: 0x40D8
STRING: Even so, I couldn't deny it.

LABEL: 0x4104
STRING: I was forced to acknowledge it.

LABEL: 0x412C
STRING: I was forced to think about it.

LABEL: 0x414C
STRING: If only I hadn't been on this ship.

LABEL: 0x417C
STRING: If only the <SHEEP III> had sailed as planned...

LABEL: 0x41B1
STRING: Then death wouldn't have torn the twins apart.

LABEL: 0x4231
STRING: I heard Yukari's quiet voice calling me.

LABEL: 0x4269
STRING: Her determination seeped into the tense atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x4295
STRING: I lifted my head and looked into her eyes.

LABEL: 0x433A
STRING: 「We need to meet up with Touri-san and Hiragino-san as soon as possible.」

LABEL: 0x43F0
STRING: 「Right now, please focus on the living.」

LABEL: 0x4463
STRING: I'd do that if I could.

LABEL: 0x44D3
STRING: It was what I had to do.

LABEL: 0x4515
STRING: I knew that, but that wasn't――

LABEL: 0x464C
STRING: 「I won't presume to know what's bothering you.」

LABEL: 0x469C
STRING: 「Whether it's about what you did or about your sister, but...」

LABEL: 0x485B
STRING: She spoke slowly, drawing out each of her words.

LABEL: 0x4976
STRING: I couldn't lose sight of living, of being alive, by being caught up in the sadness of death.

LABEL: 0x4A22
STRING: I moved my feet forward again.

LABEL: 0x4A4E
STRING: This spiral had no end in sight, but still, I continued to climb.

LABEL: 0x4BAB
STRING: Touri was still asleep in that room.

LABEL: 0x4BDB
STRING: She had tumbled and fallen to the floor.

LABEL: 0x4C03
STRING: I didn't want to leave her on the floor like that.

LABEL: 0x4C37
STRING: I lifted her up and laid her back down on the bed.

LABEL: 0x4C71
STRING: As I lifted her, she was lighter than I had imagined from her lively impression.

LABEL: 0x4CBD
STRING: I see. They really were sisters.

LABEL: 0x4CE9
STRING: They were twins who didn't look that much alike.

LABEL: 0x4D25
STRING: The few things they had in common that I could think of were few and far between.

LABEL: 0x4DAF
STRING: My heart felt like it was being gouged out.

LABEL: 0x4DD9
STRING: I put my hand on her cheek and called out to her.

LABEL: 0x4E39
STRING: I thought I'd wake her up.

LABEL: 0x4F0A
STRING: She shook her head from side to side.

LABEL: 0x4F87
STRING: She gazed at Touri's face as she slept quietly.

LABEL: 0x4FD1
STRING: I followed her lead and looked down at her face.

LABEL: 0x5037
STRING: She was breathing quietly in her sleep.

LABEL: 0x5051
STRING: The sensation of the bed tickled her as she twisted her body.

LABEL: 0x50EB
STRING: I was sure she was having a fun dream.

LABEL: 0x515F
STRING: I wished she would never have to wake up.

LABEL: 0x519B
STRING: If only her happy dream could continue on forever.

LABEL: 0x5256
STRING: That was just my own ego.

LABEL: 0x528E
STRING: Yukari, or anyone who knew the truth.

LABEL: 0x52F8
STRING: Even if this was just a meaningless delay...

LABEL: 0x532E
STRING: ...I couldn't bear telling her the truth.

LABEL: 0x54F8
STRING: Her tears had already dried up.

LABEL: 0x5550
STRING: Her eyes were still filled with deep sadness.

LABEL: 0x561C
STRING: Were they just empty words, or...

LABEL: 0x571B
STRING: But, I didn't need to ask her what her intentions were.

LABEL: 0x57AE
STRING: 「In this situation, with this many people, there's no merit in being divided into multiple groups.」

LABEL: 0x5804
STRING: 「This ship is no longer the same as it was yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x58EF
STRING: The six of us had somehow managed to stick together until yesterday.

LABEL: 0x593E
STRING: It had been a brief moment of peace.

LABEL: 0x595A
STRING: Peace and tranquility that you only realized once you'd lost it.

LABEL: 0x5988
STRING: There had been a palpable sense of peace that was now long gone.

LABEL: 0x59B0
STRING: I suddenly raised my head and looked at the LCD clock on the wall.

LABEL: 0x59E4
STRING: It had been an hour and a half since we'd found the rescue ship―since that moment of momentary hope in our hearts.

LABEL: 0x5A38
STRING: Now, there was none of it left.

LABEL: 0x5A84
STRING: ――Why had we lost so many things?

LABEL: 0x5B8C
STRING: 「It would be dangerous to go out on your own.」

LABEL: 0x5C7A
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, can you take care of Touri-san?」

LABEL: 0x5D43
STRING: The unusually quiet Tokiwa stood still, holding Touri's hand.

LABEL: 0x5DBF
STRING: After watching her back, we stepped out into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x5F4F
STRING: It had most likely taken Reiri's life.

LABEL: 0x5F9D
STRING: I didn't have the energy to ask more about it and kept on walking.

LABEL: 0x6105
STRING: After unlocking the door, we entered the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x612B
STRING: In the middle of the pastel-like room,

LABEL: 0x6153
STRING: Hiragino was hanging his head, leaning against the examination table.

LABEL: 0x61C1
STRING: Yukari ran over to him and put a hand on his shoulder.

LABEL: 0x61F5
STRING: She shook him, and he raised his head from the table.

LABEL: 0x63A5
STRING: 「I'm sorry, I'm just a little dizzy...」

LABEL: 0x643B
STRING: As he spoke, he hung his head again.

LABEL: 0x645F
STRING: His breathing was heavy, and he looked like he was in pain.

LABEL: 0x6497
STRING: Was he really just feeling dizzy?

LABEL: 0x64CB
STRING: He didn't too look well, but...

LABEL: 0x64F3
STRING: It was like he had a fever.

LABEL: 0x651F
STRING: Did he inhale the soporific smoke?

LABEL: 0x6579
STRING: It shouldn't make him sick like this...

LABEL: 0x673C
STRING: He tried to get up as he answered, and I lent him my shoulder.

LABEL: 0x680D
STRING: He put more weight on my shoulder than I expected.

LABEL: 0x6845
STRING: Despite how well-built he was, wasn't he leaning almost all of his weight against me?

LABEL: 0x68A7
STRING: He couldn't support himself at all.

LABEL: 0x68D7
STRING: It felt like his body was burning up, too.

LABEL: 0x696D
STRING: 「You don't have to go down there if...」

LABEL: 0x6A7F
STRING: 「No matter how sturdy he is, I won't leave him behind in this state.」

LABEL: 0x6B8B
STRING: With Yukari's help, we carried Hiragino...

LABEL: 0x6C27
STRING: While he was somewhat using his own legs,

LABEL: 0x6C5F
STRING: there was no denying the fact that he was being mostly carried.

LABEL: 0x6C95
STRING: It didn't seem like he had any pain or nausea, but that only made me more worried.

LABEL: 0x6CE5
STRING: However... it was also true that we couldn't leave him behind.

LABEL: 0x6D29
STRING: Together with Hiragino, we returned to the room where Touri was.

LABEL: 0x6DC6
STRING: Tokiwa was still holding her hand.

LABEL: 0x6EE8
STRING: Hiragino sat down next to Touri as he asked.

LABEL: 0x6F1E
STRING: Sitting at the edge of the cramped bed, he exhaled deeply like a frail girl.

LABEL: 0x70BE
STRING: 「...I'm sorry, Katagiri-kun. For me of all people to――」

LABEL: 0x70FF
STRING: 「Never mind that. You need to get some rest...」

LABEL: 0x71CA
STRING: Hiragino looked terribly sick, but he turned to face Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x7225
STRING: 「I'm sorry, I was careless. I didn't mean to...」

LABEL: 0x7315
STRING: His words lingered for a moment in the silence.

LABEL: 0x73D8
STRING: Hiragino stared blankly at me and immediately grasped the current situation.

LABEL: 0x7544
STRING: It was Yukari again who spoke up.

LABEL: 0x7661
STRING: 「The rescuer who came here is most likely...」

LABEL: 0x76B6
STRING: Without waiting for her to finish, Hiragino cut her off with his hand.

LABEL: 0x7724
STRING: In other words, that's how it was.

LABEL: 0x774A
STRING: Thinking back on it now, the man from before must have been a member of the rescue team after all.

LABEL: 0x778E
STRING: That humanoid shape enveloped in light.

LABEL: 0x7851
STRING: Why was he on the bridge on the first floor?

LABEL: 0x7882
STRING: Why was the watertight door to the bridge open?

LABEL: 0x78B8
STRING: Why was Reiri right next to him?

LABEL: 0x7998
STRING: What the hell... I didn't know anything.

LABEL: 0x7A56
STRING: Hiragino was probably the one most in the dark about our current circumstances right now.

LABEL: 0x7BD6
STRING: 「It would be better to ask her.」

LABEL: 0x7C5D
STRING: She looked at Tokiwa as she said it.

LABEL: 0x7C95
STRING: Tokiwa reacted to her gaze with an expression that said, "That's probably true."

LABEL: 0x7EB0
STRING: She kept her mouth shut and only stared at us with sadness in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x8051
STRING: She looked at us without hesitation,

LABEL: 0x8085
STRING: and began talking with unsteady eyes like those of a cat, staring at a corner of the room.

LABEL: 0x8133
STRING: 「After Sousuke-san went into the rescue ship, I was left alone.」

LABEL: 0x81E7
STRING: 「In that silent emergency room, while I was waiting for Sousuke-san...」

LABEL: 0x8286
STRING: 「...I suddenly decided to examine that diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x82E1
STRING: It was different from the ones stored inside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x832C
STRING: It was true that if you examined it, you might be able to find out something――

LABEL: 0x83BF
STRING: 「My footsteps echoed in the empty room.」

LABEL: 0x83FF
STRING: 「That was how it was supposed to be.」

LABEL: 0x847A
STRING: 「――But then, there was a tap on my shoulder.」

LABEL: 0x84E8
STRING: 「I wondered if it was just my imagination, so I quickly shook it off with my hand.」

LABEL: 0x85EA
STRING: 「――Someone grabbed my hand as I did.」

LABEL: 0x86FA
STRING: 「It was a man with a mask covering his whole face.」

LABEL: 0x8726
STRING: 「He let go of my hand and held out the same kind of mask he was wearing.」

LABEL: 0x87C8
STRING: 「Apparently, he was telling me to take it.」

LABEL: 0x880E
STRING: 「I couldn't see his face or make out his expression, but there was no way I could defy him.」

LABEL: 0x88CB
STRING: Tokiwa was talking in a whisper.

LABEL: 0x88F1
STRING: I couldn't imagine her acting like that, and that made her words sound even more true.

LABEL: 0x89A1
STRING: 「When I took the mask, he told me to put it on.」

LABEL: 0x8A17
STRING: 「After I did, he gestured for me to follow him.」

LABEL: 0x8AA4
STRING: 「...Wasn't it dangerous to go along with him?」

LABEL: 0x8AE5
STRING: 「Still, it's dangerous to disobey an unknown opponent as well...」

LABEL: 0x8BCB
STRING: But even so, didn't she put up any kind of resistance?

LABEL: 0x8CAB
STRING: 「"I'll show you a rare deep-sea creature," he said.」

LABEL: 0x8D64
STRING: Weren't you taught not to follow strangers?

LABEL: 0x8E1C
STRING: 「I was taught not to doubt people without a reason.」

LABEL: 0x8E8D
STRING: She had so little common sense that I was speechless.

LABEL: 0x8EC3
STRING: How could she have lived so innocently without being affected by other people's malice until now?

LABEL: 0x8F87
STRING: 「But, I had no interest in walking in the rain.」

LABEL: 0x8FCB
STRING: 「My kimono was going to get wet.」

LABEL: 0x8FF9
STRING: 「When a kimono gets wet, it becomes heavy.」

LABEL: 0x902B
STRING: 「So, I asked him to wait until the sprinklers stopped.」

LABEL: 0x9081
STRING: 「We then went out and started walking.」

LABEL: 0x90B5
STRING: 「It was dark, so it took us quite a while.」

LABEL: 0x9106
STRING: She let out a sigh saying that.

LABEL: 0x91D8
STRING: 「I followed him down the stairs, heading straight for the bridge on the first floor.」

LABEL: 0x923E
STRING: 「By the time we reached the bridge, I had already returned the mask to him.」

LABEL: 0x929C
STRING: 「I was a little dizzy but felt nothing worse than that after taking a few breaths.」

LABEL: 0x9304
STRING: 「And then... on the other side of the bridge...」

LABEL: 0x939E
STRING: 「I peeked over his back and saw――」

LABEL: 0x94A1
STRING: 「Reiri-chan was there alone, standing still and facing us.」

LABEL: 0x9542
STRING: She wasn't brought there by anyone... Did she go there on her own?

LABEL: 0x9592
STRING: Or did someone take her there after all...?

LABEL: 0x95DA
STRING: I didn't know, but either way, why was she there?

LABEL: 0x965B
STRING: 「The masked man looked surprised when he saw her.」

LABEL: 0x969B
STRING: 「Perhaps he was even more surprised than I was.」

LABEL: 0x96E1
STRING: 「In spite of that, a moment later, he was preoccupied with something else.」

LABEL: 0x978E
STRING: Tokiwa closed her eyes as if recalling a scene from that moment.

LABEL: 0x9898
STRING: 「There was something glowing in the water.」

LABEL: 0x98D6
STRING: 「The masked man looked less surprised and more frightened when he saw that light.」

LABEL: 0x9946
STRING: 「I was convinced from just looking at it.」

LABEL: 0x99C3
STRING: There definitely were many creatures that emitted light in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x9ACC
STRING: It had swelled and stretched in the air and attacked Reiri.

LABEL: 0x9B08
STRING: If that was a living creature, then...

LABEL: 0x9BF6
STRING: 「It was a creature I'd never seen or heard of.」

LABEL: 0x9C30
STRING: 「I couldn't help but jump toward the light in excitement.」

LABEL: 0x9D21
STRING: 「The masked man grabbed my kimono and held me back.」

LABEL: 0x9DBE
STRING: I thought back to the mass of light from earlier.

LABEL: 0x9DE6
STRING: Those two had been swallowed up by the light and died.

LABEL: 0x9E18
STRING: Had he known that it was dangerous beforehand...?

LABEL: 0x9E5D
STRING: 「"What are you doing?!" he asked fiercely, but those were his last words.」

LABEL: 0x9EED
STRING: 「She pushed him with her whole body.」

LABEL: 0x9F34
STRING: Reiri had pushed the man down with a body slam.

LABEL: 0x9F64
STRING: Which meant the one who killed him was...

LABEL: 0xA01C
STRING: 「The light picked up speed and headed in his direction.」

LABEL: 0xA0AF
STRING: The source of the human-shaped light I saw was him overrun by the light...

LABEL: 0xA15A
STRING: 「All I could do was watch him be engulfed by the light.」

LABEL: 0xA1DC
STRING: 「Immediately after that, Katagiri-san and Yukari-san arrived.」

LABEL: 0xA28F
STRING: She held her tongue and gritted her teeth as if trying to hold something back.

LABEL: 0xA2F3
STRING: Seeing her like that made all of us feel the same way.

LABEL: 0xA468
STRING: 「If it's a living creature, what is it?」

LABEL: 0xA4A6
STRING: 「I only caught a glimpse of it, so I don't really understand...」

LABEL: 0xA51A
STRING: As I broke the silence, Tokiwa answered in the same tone as always.

LABEL: 0xA571
STRING: 「Unfortunately, I couldn't see very well, either.」

LABEL: 0xA5B1
STRING: 「But... I could see at least a few dozen points of light.」

LABEL: 0xA5EF
STRING: 「I don't know if they're all living creatures, but I think they're more like a group than a single being.」

LABEL: 0xA7D7
STRING: A chill ran down my spine.

LABEL: 0xA7FD
STRING: A swarming mass of specks of light, covered in legs...?

LABEL: 0xA833
STRING: I had absolutely no idea what it was.

LABEL: 0xA857
STRING: I was supposed to have a decent amount of knowledge about deep-sea creatures thanks to my sister, but I still had no idea...

LABEL: 0xA8C7
STRING: What in the hell was that thing?

LABEL: 0xA8F1
STRING: How did it get into this ship?

LABEL: 0xA9A6
STRING: His face was as pale as ever, but he still felt my gaze on him and shook his head from side to side.

LABEL: 0xAA05
STRING: 「I'm afraid I don't know much about that thing.」

LABEL: 0xAAC4
STRING: She was an expert, so to speak, having explored these waters in the past.

LABEL: 0xAB12
STRING: If not, as the chief attendant of the <SHEEP III>, she should at least have knowledge of the ecology of the nearby sea.

LABEL: 0xAC9C
STRING: 「...I've studied this sea more than anyone.」

LABEL: 0xACDC
STRING: 「And since I'm involved in cutting-edge research, I should know better than anyone.」

LABEL: 0xAE72
STRING: 「We don't know anything about that lifeform in this area.」

LABEL: 0xAEB0
STRING: 「It's not just a matter of my lack of knowledge.」

LABEL: 0xAF8D
STRING: Her meaningful words echoed inside the room.
